name: NU_EhrlichiosisTestsForEhrlichiaSpeciesAntibodyQualitative
title: NU_Ehrlichiosis (Tests for Ehrlichia species Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Ehrlichia species antibody -
 Qualitative results.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Ehrlichia Antibody; LOINC Scale = ORD; 

LOINC search: Ehrlichia -anaplasma Ab Ord -panel),(Exclusion Criteria: 87547-6
Borrelia burgdorferi Ab and Anaplasma phagocytophilum, Babesia microti and Ehrlichia chaffeensis IgG panel - Serum)
